message:
If you run your company's blog, or have your own, please read this.
http://www.prdaily.com/Main/Articles/14912.aspx
name: How using Google Images can cost you $8,000
caption: www.prdaily.com
description: This is a lesson we recently learned the hard way, and if you have (or contribute to) a blog, you might want to read our story so that you never, ever make the same mistake we did.
